description: Two of the ultimate comfort foods combine in this simple chicken curry pie with a crisp filo pastry top.
name: Chicken Curry Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the pie, pour the chicken curry sauce into a large ovenproof dish and top with filo pastry sheets. Brush the pastry with butter and bake for 25 minutes, until golden.
